page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT/LAW IN LT.GADDES.
page.content: Previously people worked on farms or for Ashridge Estate.Village is now larger and about 75% work in jobs outside the area, travelling by car, or train from the towns.Others work at Ashridge College or at Expotechnic- a factory making exhibition stands. Some are self-employed, domestic work or make pottery etc. to sell. The Police House is in the centre of Lt. Gaddesden village.The P.C.is based on Berkhamsted and has other villages under his wing. If an emergency arises (very seldom) apart from 999 you ring Berkhamsted 71551 and the call is passed to a patrol car. The text and data concerning land use and amenities were written and collated by the older children in Class III of Lt. Gaddesden C.E.School with the Head aided by various adult friends of the School.
